alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:58AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Meriwether and Troup Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 757 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Fredonia, or near Stroud, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Hogansville, Pine Mountain, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
